name: Tenebrosity (Futuregames)
description:
There is something in the darkness. 

A monster? Or entity? 

Stay close to the light and proceed with caution. Tenebrosity is a short first-person perspective online two-player co-op. Both players are trying to escape a cultist mansion where a strange darkness took over. This is no simple task, but both of you count on special abilities. Both can use telekinesis to push, pull, and carry objects with their mind. But, as important as telekinesis you can also change the position of some light sources, carry them around, and use them to open and close doors. Now you just need to avoid the darkness and stay close to your friend in this puzzle-filled mansion, find both keys to finally escape this nightmare.
